name: Flybe Full Flight: Edinburgh to East Midlands - Bombardier DHC8-Q400
description:
A full length, full flight video with Flybe onboard Bombardier Dash 8 DHC8-Q400 G-JEDM operating flight BE263 from Edinburgh to East Midlands on 28 August 2017.

**Every moment of the flight included from terminal to terminal**

BECOME AN INFLIGHT VIDEO VIP AT http://patreon.com/inflightvideo

PLEASE SUBSCRIBE FOR WEEKLY FULL FLIGHTSAirline:  Flybe
Flight:  BE263
Aircraft:  Bombardier DHC8-Q400 G-JEDM
From:  Edinburgh (EDI)
To:  East Midlands (EMA)
Departure:  10:51
Arrival:  11:45
Flight Time:  0:54
Seat:  7D
Flight Path: http://infl.it/be263map

Our flight today begins with a sprint through the terminal after a late inbound flight.  I arrive at the gate after the rest of the passengers have boarded, and quickly make my way to the bus that will take us to our aircraft for today - DHC8-Q400 G-JEDM.

We take our seat in seat 7D and before long the engines start and we are free to catch our breath.  We make a short taxi to the active runway at Edinburgh before departing to the west, and making a left turn.  The cloudy weather soon turns into a beautiful day as we head across Northern England and the Lake District, and we are treated to some magnificent views on approach to East Midlands Airport.

After following a non standard arrival pattern, flying past the airport and then making a left turn back around overhead Loughborough, we commence our final approach to runway 27 at East Midlands Airport, where we touch down on schedule on a beautiful summer day.

#inflightVideo #FullFlight
#inflightVideo #FullFlight #FullFlightVideo
